pages.text: Generates as disks under grassy surfaces.
Generates as disks in rivers and oceans. Can be mined by a pan to yield resources.
Generates as the bottom layer of the Nether. Can be mined by a pan to yield resources. Tagged as #minecraft:sand.
Found under water in non-ocean biomes. Can be crushed to yield various resources.
Generates as a sill (disk) in stones. Source of phosphorus.
Generates as a sill (disk) in stones in Desert and Mesa biomes. Source of iron.
